pages.title: Neutrion Ore
pages.text: Dig deep enough and you'll start seeing a faint purple glow coming from the stone walls. That's $(thing)Neutrion Ore$(). It's the backbone of everything the Architects left behind.$(br2)Mine it with an iron pickaxe or better to get $(item)Raw Neutrion$(). Throw it in a furnace or blast furnace to get $(item)Neutrion Ingots$().

pages.title: Neutrion Block
pages.text: Pack 9 ingots into a block for storage. You can always unpack them later.

pages.title: Ingots from Block
pages.text: Place the block in a crafting grid to get your 9 ingots back.
